Extract comprehensive data for all AI agents listed across all categories on agentbeats.dev.

For each agent extract:
1. Category (coding, web, multi-agent, research, agent-safety, computer-use, etc.)
2. Name and author
3. External links (ArXiv papers, GitHub repos, leaderboards)
4. Architecture, purpose, goal, and approach from web sources
5. Tech stack keywords (Python, Docker, A2A Protocol, NetworkX, etc.)
6. Activity details (created date, color: green/purple)

All fields must include source URL citations.

Return ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. No markdown, explanations, or commentary.
